purpose: The email announces two postdoc positions available at King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM) in Saudi Arabia, specifically in the fields of Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering. The positions are for two years with a potential extension based on performance. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by sending their CV or inquiries to Prof. Mohammad Alshayeb.
evidence_sentences: We are seeking applications for two postdoc positions in the areas of Secure Software Development/Software Security and Artificial Intelligence in Software Engineering.
The positions are for two years, with the possibility of extension for an additional two years based on performance and mutual agreement.
Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or direct any inquiries to: Prof. Mohammad Alshayeb.
